name: Sven Treasure Hunter
description:
Sven is a viking that stumbled with a mine. Uppon catching a whiff of the scent of richess, he and his trusty pickaxe and descends down into the cave. But the caves are very hot, so he'll need to gather beer to keep his viking strength up!

Engage in a singleplayer adventure to get as much gold as posible!

I am a dwarf and I'm digging a hole...

Controls:

A - D To: Face - Mine - Move.

ESC To: PAUSE

Game Developed BY:

Fermin Gimpel - Programming

Andres Pluda - Art

Francisco Imperioso - SFX/Music
